scripts.test:backoffice: npm run setup-db && npx playwright test backoffice/
scripts.test:backoffice:dev: npm run setup-db && npx playwright test backoffice/ --headed
scripts.test:backoffice:dev:debug: npm run setup-db && npx playwright test backoffice/ --headed --debug
scripts.setup-db: npm run test:setup --prefix=./../prisma && npm run test:seed --prefix=./../prisma
